steps.question: You have swiped a customer’s card at the READY prompt and the terminal displays ‘CARD READ FAILURE. You may proceed with:

answers.answer: Keying in the amount of the transaction and swiping the card again
Entering the customer’s card number when you see the READY prompt
Asking the customer to pay in cash

steps.question: You need to make a Refund of the payment with Gratuity. You will proceed with:

answers.answer: Paying the refund in cash with no gratuity
Choosing the Refund option and entering total amount incl. gratuity
Choosing the Refund option and entering total amount without gratuity
Explaining to the customer that we don't do refunds

steps.question: Transaction Reversal. The reversal can be made:

answers.answer: within 30 seconds after the original payment transaction or refund
by choosing the Reversal option at the prompt menu
the receipt will be printed after the successful reversal

steps.question: Printing the transaction log. You can print:

answers.answer: all transactions for the last 24 hours
all transactions for chosen date and time interval
